sentences.english: The colorful and rich diversified culture has cultivated the Xiantao people's opening and forgiving personality.
sentences.chinese: 五彩斑斕的多元文化，孕育了仙桃人開放包容的個性。

sentences.english: I can still enjoy this colorful world.
sentences.chinese: 我依然可以享受這個五彩斑斕的世界。

sentences.english: The night sky with colorful Band gorgeous, the crowd flocked to the carnival.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，同樂坊的天空五彩斑斕，狂歡的人羣絡繹不絕。

sentences.english: The Weedy Sea Dragon is a weird, wonderful and colorful underwater creature.
sentences.chinese: 草海龍是一種詭異但卻奇妙而色彩斑斕的海底生物。

sentences.english: Multicolored amour, mental place to, give people the space of infinite freedom.
sentences.chinese: 五彩斑斕的戀情，精神所向，給人們無限自由的空間。

sentences.english: He swam up past the boulders made of spongy gishy-gosh.
sentences.chinese: 他遊遊過一堆色彩斑斕，類似海綿的海洋浮游物。

sentences.english: She begins by opening a colorful hatbox.
sentences.chinese: 她常用一個色彩斑斕的冒盒作爲自己的開場。

sentences.english: In your groping sight, each second is a bright-coloured.
sentences.chinese: 在妳探索的目光中，每一秒都是一副斑斕的圖畫。

sentences.english: After the color in the woodlands, the leaves will blanket the soil.
sentences.chinese: 林地裏斑斕的葉片將爲大地鋪上一層厚毯。

sentences.english: May the colorful kaleidoscopes arouse memories of your childhood?
sentences.chinese: 五彩斑斕的萬花筒是否能喚起你童年的回憶呢？

sentences.english: Yes I could almost touch the colorful fish.
sentences.chinese: 去了，我差點摸到那些色彩斑斕的魚。

sentences.english: Beauty in the West is unninuring.
Colorful spring of boundless energy, blooming with Pompon life.
sentences.chinese: 色彩斑斕的春天，蘊藏着無限活力，勃發着蓬蓬生機。

sentences.english: HIS beautiful little island contains some of the most picturesque scenery in England.
sentences.chinese: 他的斑斕小島蘊含一些最如詩如畫的景色在英格蘭。

sentences.english: Natural color has given way to such Bright-colored artificial dyestuff in effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 面對如此色彩斑斕的人工染料，自然色彩已俯首稱臣。

sentences.english: shaded and fanned by the gorgeous wings of a beautiful Butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 一隻美麗的蝴蝶用它色彩斑斕的翅膀在螞蟻頭上扇動。

definition: nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
